meanings.definition: A party where beer is served from a keg.
meanings.sent1: Last weekend, we had a keggers at my friend's house.
meanings.sent2: Keggers are popular among college students for socializing.
meanings.sent3: The neighborhood keggers always bring the community together.
meanings.sent4: The keggers flowed like a river at the lively gathering.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the keggers lingered in their minds long after the party ended.

meanings.definition: A person who attends keg parties.
meanings.sent1: My roommate is a regular keggers and always knows where the parties are.
meanings.sent2: Keggers often have a great time socializing with friends.
meanings.sent3: The dedicated keggers never miss a chance to enjoy a good party.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the life of the keggers, always bringing energy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The enthusiastic keggers added a vibrant atmosphere to the gathering.
